data.prayer: Father, help the 11,399 believers in Sirohi to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sirohi, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Sirohi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Sirohi, Rajasthan, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,036,300 citizens of Sirohi, Rajasthan, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Rajput Parmar people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Sirohi unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, let the threatened of Sirohi, Rajasthan, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Sirohi be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Sirohi
location.people_groups_list: Khasdar, Turi Barot, Makwana (Hindu traditions), Targala, Salat (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Khasdar (100), Turi Barot (15,000), Makwana (Hindu traditions) (66,000), Targala (36,000), Salat (Muslim traditions) (600)
